title: Cherie DeVille Tells Sharp EVERYTHING About The Adult Industry
description:
Sharp and Cherie Deville talk about longevity in the industry, building a career, investing and much more!
-----
00:00 Intro
2:13 How to build a career before social media
2:35 Cherie's initial job was physical therapy, she got noticed by an agency right away
10:22 Sharp says playing games could be dangerous if you don't have a safe word
11:26 There's a difference between harm and consensual harm, says she did most of her fantasies on screen
16:18 Cherie worked for years building her content before social media, now there's too much competition
17:40 Sharp says some are underpaid, Cherie confirms and breaks down how some actors work paycheck to paycheck
19:00 A retired actress has a harder time getting a job than a felon
21:03 If you start in this industry you can't really do much after if you quit
22:14 Cherie will continue to ride her wave for as long as she has the forum to do it, plus saves a lot of money, she has enough to stop working right now
25:55 Cherie is very grateful for her career
29:30 Cherie never had s*x with someone who wasn't tested
-----
